original: JOHANSSON, Carl Oskar Werner, Grosshandlare, Alingsås, f Arelid Långared, Älvsb l, 25/3 84 av hemm.äg Johannes A o h h Anna, gm Hulda Johansson. Anst i byggn.-fma A Nilsson 07, i Sveaboden A Karlsson 08, inneh eg manuf.fma 09—25, driv fabr- o en-grosrörelse i manuf.branschen und fma Gustafson & Werner sed. 19. Led av drätselk sed. 28 o ordf i dess III avd sed. 34, ordf i planter.ktén sed. 34, styr.led o v. kassör i Alingsås Miss.församl 25—36, ordf i lokal-ktén av Nationalfrn f trafiksäkerh :s befrämj, i Alingsås Fastigh.äg.frn o i Lövekulle Villa-äg.frn, led i Alingsås hyresnämnd.
translated: JOHANSSON, Carl Oskar Werner, Wholesale Merchant, Alingsås, born in Arelid Långared, Älvsborg County, on March 25, 1884, son of homeowner Johannes A and Anna, married to Hulda Johansson. Employed at the construction company A Nilsson since 1907, at Sveaboden A Karlsson since 1908, became the owner of a manufacturing company from 1909 to 1925, operated a factory and wholesale business in the manufacturing industry, and became a partner at Gustafson & Werner since 1919. Became a member of the local council in 1928 and chairman of its III division since 1934, chairman of the planning committee since 1934, board member and deputy treasurer of Alingsås Mission Congregation from 1925 to 1936, chairman of the local committee of the National Association for the Promotion of Traffic Safety, chairman of the Alingsås Property Owners' Association and the Lövekulle Villa Owners' Association, and a member of the Alingsås rent tribunal.

membership.name: National Association for the Promotion of Traffic Safety
